name: SupportEirikaAndInnes
_source: speak;Innes;Eirika.|I know this might seem sudden, but...|I've decided I must protect you for a while.
speak;Eirika;What?|What do you mean by that?
speak;Innes;I was in a difficult situation at Carcino.|I...must admit that I owe you much for your help that day.
speak;Innes;So now, I've decided to protect you in battle.|I don't know how to say this, but...|It is unacceptable that I remain indebted to you.
speak;Eirika;Oh, you and your foolish pride-
speak;Innes;Regardless, you can count on me.|No arrow can reach all enemies, but I guarantee your safety.|Will you accept my oath?
speak;Eirika;Uh, wait a moment, Innes.|You're an archer...|Wouldn't it make more sense if you stayed behind me?
speak;Innes;...I told you I was going to protect you.
speak;Innes;And yet, whenever an enemy shows himself, you rush in and attack!|...Everyone's going to think you're the one protecting me.
speak;Eirika;Well, I can't help you with your image problems, Innes.|You're an archer, while I have to fight up close.
speak;Innes;That is unacceptable.|I said that I would protect you, and I was being quite sincere.
speak;Eirika;And I appreciate that.|It's nice to know that, when I cross swords with the enemy, you're never far from me, with your bow close at hand.
speak;Innes;Eirika...|You are so kind...|You're so different from that...|brother of yours.
speak;Eirika;No, not as much as you think.|Maybe you only see him as a warrior, as competition, but he is a fine and gentle man, capable of great compassion.
speak;Innes;...If you say so.|I suppose I cannot doubt it if it comes from your lips.
speak;Eirika;Prince Innes, please, try to befriend my brother.|I know he would want this as well.|I don't know why you dislike him.|When I am alone with him, he is so kind.
speak;Innes;Forgive me, but I can bear no more of this talk.|When I see you look that way, I feel only jealousy for this Ephraim.
speak;Innes;He is...a hard man to forgive.|Perhaps there is only one way to settle this.
speak;Innes;Eirika.|Forgive the intrusion, but I must speak to you at once.
speak;Innes;First, just listen to me|Is there...anyone who lays claim to your heart?
speak;Innes;I see.|Then let me speak frankly.|Eirika, it seems I have fallen in love with you.
speak;Eirika;Wh-what!?|This is no place for jokes, Innes!|Why would you say something like that?

speak;Innes;This is no joke.|I am absolutely serious.|These feelings surprise me as well.|I don't know what to do.|Fighting at your side all this time, the emotion just exploded within me.|I love you.|I could not bear to see you in the arms of another.
speak;Innes;No, Eirika.|Do not answer now.|I have not yet bested Ephraim.|I have not earned the right to woo you.
speak;Eirika;Wha-?|Why are you bringing my brother into this?

speak;Innes;With a man like him around, I can see why you show no interest in suitors.|If I prove myself his superior, you will surely accept my hand.|If I fail, I release any claim to your affection.|But I swear it on the depth of my love that I will destroy that man.|Eirika, I will expect your answer then.|That's all I have to say.
speak;Eirika;Innes!|What an...infuriating man!|Why does he have to be so...
